exceptions.exn: In environment b : Z H : is_gcdZ 0 b (Z.abs b) Unable to unify "(0 ?= Z.abs ?M1481)%Z = Gt -> False" with "(0 <=? Z.abs b)%Z = true".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment a, d, q, r : Z H : is_gcdZ a (a * q + r) d H0 : a <> 0%Z H1 : (0 <= r < Z.abs a)%Z H3 : is_gcdZ r a d The term "0" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "Z".

original: intros a b d H. inversion H; subst. - apply Z.leb_le. apply Z.abs_nonneg. - apply Z.le_trans with (m:= 0). apply Z.leb_le. lia. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply H0.
